sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.scss'] }) export class AboutComponent { }

Palakeerthi Siva Phani Kumar

Software Engineer – DevOps & Frontend

About Me

I am a Software Engineer with professional experience in Angular development and strong hands-on exposure to DevOps practices. I began my career focusing on Angular UI development, building responsive interfaces and integrating REST APIs. Over time, I transitioned into DevOps, where I have spent the last 1.5 years working on CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure, containerization, and application deployments. I am passionate about automation, cloud-native technologies, and building reliable, scalable systems while continuing to leverage my frontend background to deliver end-to-end solutions.

Professional Experience

Angular Developer

Aug 2023 – Jan 2024

  • Developed responsive and interactive user interfaces using Angular, HTML, CSS, and TypeScript.
  • Worked on UI design, component-based architecture, and feature implementation.
  • Integrated frontend components with backend services using RESTful APIs.
  • Collaborated with backend and QA teams to fix bugs and improve application usability.

DevOps

Feb 2024 – August 2025

  • Designed, implemented, and maintained CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions.
  • Automated cloud infrastructure provisioning on AWS using Terraform (IaC).
  • Containerized applications using Docker and deployed them on Kubernetes (EKS).
  • Managed Linux servers (RHEL), including user management, permissions, and troubleshooting.
  • Configured Nginx, SSL/TLS certificates, and application ports for secure deployments.
  • Monitored application and infrastructure health using Prometheus, Grafana, and CloudWatch.
  • Collaborated with development and QA teams to support agile releases and ensure high availability.
